actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase the amount of certain employees' death benefits which may be excluded from gross income.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase the amount of employees' death benefits that may be excluded from gross income from $5,000 to $20,000.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase the amount of certain employees' death benefits which may be excluded from gross income.
